meanings.definition: To chew or masticate with only one tooth or side of the mouth.
meanings.english_definition: To chew or masticate with only one tooth or side of the mouth.

examples.sentence: The old man had lost most of his teeth and could only monomastigate his food.
examples.translation: その老人はほとんどの歯を失っており、片側の歯だけで食べ物を噛むことしかできなかった。
